item.title: Data Mining for Digital Humanities
item.description: Data Mining for Digital Humanities The acquisition of computational skills in research practice across various fields of the humanities is one of the pillars of what is being called Digital Humanities.

item.title: Digital History
item.description: Digital History Research in the field of Digital History has been developed in direct partnership between LABHDUFBA and the undergraduate History program of the University for International Integration of Afro-Brazilian Lusophony, MalÃªs campus.
